extendedInfo.description: *** Need to go, on the go?  SitOrSquat by Charmin can help you find public restrooms near you or where youâre planning to travel.  Install SitOrSquat and search, view, rate and add public restrooms to help you, your family and others enjoy the go, on the go. Now available in English and Spanish. ***FEATURES:â¢ SEARCH and VIEW public restrooms nearest your current location on a map or in a list.â¢ MAP results with an interactive, location-based map.â¢ REGISTER using Facebook Connect to Rate, Add, Upload Pictures, and Bookmark bathrooms.â¢ RATE restrooms by choosing âSitâ (you enjoyed the bathroom) or âSquatâ (it could be better) and provide your relevant experience and honest opinions, including pictures.â¢ ADD public restrooms to the database by entering basic location information and optional details like pictures and features.â¢ FILTER results by choosing specific features such as Open Now, Sit-or-Squat Rating, Family Bathroom, Baby Changing Table, Handicap Accessible, or Pay-Per-Use toilets.â¢ BOOKMARK your favorite locations or map out locations for an upcoming trip.â¢ SHARE with friends via Facebook.The SitOrSquat by Charmin app lets you access and record bathroom information wherever you go.  All of our restroom content is added by YOU, our loyal users. We currently have over 100,000 bathrooms and we need your help in growing that database. Join the SitOrSquat movement! Download the app and add/review a bathroom today!  We all go. Why not enjoy the go with SitOrSquat by Charmin.NOTE:  SitOrSquat uses Facebook Connect. Opening this app may send personal information about you or your device to Facebook.SitOrSquat ON THE WEBâ¢ Visit sitorsquat.com for our website version.â¢ âLikeâ Charmin on Facebook.â¢ Follow us on Twitter @Charmin or tweet #tweetfromtheseatâ¢ Visit charmin.com for more information on versions for other mobile devices.Trust is a cornerstone of our corporate mission, and the success of our business depends on it. P&G is committed to maintaining your trust by protecting personal information we collect about you, our consumers. View full details of our Privacy Statement:http://www.pg.com/privacy/english/privacy_notice.shtml

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I usualy can\'t find the bathroom in my house so this app is key whenever I have to take a crap. Before this app I had to go in a random room and hope it was the bathroom or else spring vleaning would come soon.
reviews.author: Joe Bob

reviews.title: Funny
reviews.comment: Omg this is a funny app. It has my friends house on here too. I should take a picture of their bathroom... mmm better be clean... lol
reviews.author: Elizabeth Schneider

reviews.title: Life saver app
reviews.comment: I work traveling all day up to 250 miles driving.  I love this app, it\'s working well on my phone.  Now I can remember the nice bathrooms and mark the scary ones with this phone.  Some bathrooms in my area are already marked but,  I\'m finding that the ones I use most often were not when I got the app.  Now not only am I helping my own memory but all other travelers with this app who drive in the Greater Sacramento Area.
reviews.author: Bastet Mau

reviews.title: Very helpful
reviews.comment: Nice to know where rest rooms are located, as I travel a lot, on my job.
reviews.author: Howie Field

reviews.title: Hobby
reviews.comment: I always have this app ready with me. I love to visit restaurants and places just to sit on the toilet. I love the aroma and feel I get being near a toilet.
reviews.author: David Lopez

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: App will not connect. It always says the server temporary can\'t be reached
reviews.author: Ween The Savage

reviews.title: Cute!!!!
reviews.comment: Great idea.
reviews.author: Wayne Cain

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I  live the concept and will use it on my upcoming trip.
reviews.author: Debby McGrath

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: This app is so helpful! Thanks!
reviews.author: Keysha Rivera

reviews.title: GREAT IDEA!!!!
reviews.comment: So very glad someone came up with app.  It seems someone always  has 2 go when & where there is No bathroom.  Thank you very much to the one who created this app.
reviews.author: SYLVIA TONEY

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: When you gotta go this app is the bomb
reviews.author: David Corsover

reviews.title: Clean
reviews.comment: Good
reviews.author: maritza arroyo

reviews.comment: Really
reviews.author: wendy henigan

reviews.title: Good design but buggy
reviews.comment: First of all, why do I have to provide my birth date and agree to terms of service before using this app? That is not normal for Android apps!  Secondly, it has a very nice design and it is a good idea, but it is buggy. When you zoom in on a section of the map it takes ages to reload the bathroom pins in the area, and when you try to tap on one of them often nothing happens.
reviews.author: Jeremy Andrews

reviews.title: Great idea, but still doesn\'t work properly even after update.
reviews.comment: This app is a great idea, but it would be even better if it worked. You can log in but it doesn\'t show any bathrooms in the area. I zoomed around my city looking for something and had to go to Chicago before the app registered any bathrooms. It was then that I noticed that even if you find bathrooms after being extremely zoomed out, it stops registering that the bathrooms are there after you zoom in closer. I even added a bathroom and couldn\'t find it after going through the process. Please fix!
reviews.author: Jackie Baughman

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: This app is genius!
reviews.author: Leanna Miller

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Server unavailable every time...uninstalling now.
reviews.author: Debra Meder

reviews.title: Unbelievably handy
reviews.comment: For folks like me, who like to know where their next BR break is coming from, this is a vital app when traversing the hostile restroom wilderness that is NYC.
reviews.author: Sissy Van Dyke

reviews.title: Great idea
reviews.comment: My friends laughed at me, til one of them rode to Dallas for a doctors appointment and it used it and got laughed at, so we stop at one that said no. I stayed in the car and when she can back she told me that the application was right and she was down loading it to her. I could only laugh at here then. Thanks
reviews.author: Mary Duke

reviews.title: Not thourgh
reviews.comment: Not many places listed.
reviews.author: charles main
